General.Name: BW Offshore Ltd.
General.Description: BW Offshore Limited engages in the engineering of offshore production solutions in the Americas, Europe, Africa, Asia, and the Pacific. The company builds, owns, leases, and operates floating, production, storage, and offloading vessels (FPSOs) for oil and gas industries. It also provides engineering services. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
